alert.note: Alert for Gibson (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 12 at 9:59AM EDT until March 13 at 11:00PM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... Patoka River near Princeton. .The Patoka River at Princeton is cresting and will begin a slow fall to below flood stage by Monday afternoon. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Patoka River near Princeton. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 AM CDT Sunday the stage was 18.7 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:45 AM CDT Sunday was 18.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage tomorrow afternoon and continue falling to 10.5 feet Wednesday, March 22. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
